column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////What a great experience! Beautiful restaurant and atmosphere. Went for my boyfriends birthday dinner
column2: was seated in the parlor. The ambience was perfect- music
column4: comfortable seating. Drinks were perfectly recommended from our waiter. We shared the avocado clam salad
column5: 22 oz ribeye and mashed potatoes. Food was amazing!
